statements: SELECT * FROM transportation_data;
SELECT trip_id, trip_date, start_location, end_location, mode_of_transport, trip_duration_minutes FROM transportation_data;
SELECT start_location, end_location, trip_duration_minutes, mode_of_transport, trip_date, trip_id FROM transportation_data;
SELECT trip_date, end_location, start_location FROM transportation_data ORDER BY trip_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM transportation_data WHERE trip_duration_minutes > 60 ORDER BY trip_duration_minutes DESC;
SELECT trip_id, start_location, end_location FROM transportation_data WHERE mode_of_transport = 'Car' ORDER BY trip_date DESC, trip_duration_minutes ASC

SELECT trip_id, start_location, end_location, trip_duration_minutes FROM transportation_data WHERE trip_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' AND mode_of_transport = 'Train' ORDER BY trip_duration_minutes DESC
SELECT trip_id, start_location, end_location, mode_of_transport FROM transportation_data WHERE trip_date < '2021-12-31' ORDER BY trip_id ASC
SELECT * FROM transportation_data WHERE end_location LIKE '%City%' AND mode_of_transport IN ('Bus', 'Bike') ORDER BY trip_date DESC
SELECT trip_id, start_location, trip_date, trip_duration_minutes FROM transportation_data WHERE mode_of_transport = 'Walking' ORDER BY trip_date ASC, trip_duration_minutes ASC
SELECT * FROM transportation_usage WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, start_location, end_location FROM transportation_usage WHERE trip_date = '2022-01-15';
SELECT * FROM transportation_modes WHERE average_speed > 50 ORDER BY mode_name DESC;
SELECT user_id, trip_id, start_location, end_location FROM transportation_usage WHERE trip_id = 123;
SELECT mode_id, mode_name, carbon_footprint FROM transportation_modes WHERE carbon_footprint < 100 ORDER BY carbon_footprint ASC;
SELECT * FROM transportation_usage WHERE user_id = 1
SELECT trip_id, start_location, end_location FROM transportation_usage WHERE trip_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01'
SELECT user_id, trip_id, start_location, end_location, trip_date FROM transportation_usage WHERE start_location = 'City A' AND end_location = 'City B'
SELECT mode_name, average_speed FROM transportation_modes WHERE carbon_footprint < 50.0 ORDER BY average_speed DESC
SELECT trip_id, start_location, end_location, trip_date FROM transportation_usage WHERE user_id = 2 AND trip_date > '2021-12-01' ORDER BY trip_date DESC
SELECT * FROM transportation_routes;
SELECT route_name, route_type FROM transportation_routes;
SELECT route_name, route_type FROM transportation_routes WHERE route_type = 'bus';
SELECT * FROM transportation_stops ORDER BY stop_name DESC;
SELECT stop_name, stop_location FROM transportation_stops WHERE stop_location LIKE 'Downtown%';
SELECT * FROM transportation_routes;
SELECT route_id, route_name FROM transportation_routes WHERE route_type='bus';
SELECT MAX(usage_date) FROM transportation_usage;
SELECT stop_name, stop_location FROM transportation_stops ORDER BY stop_name ASC;
SELECT route_name, COUNT(DISTINCT user_id) AS unique_users FROM transportation_usage JOIN transportation_routes ON transportation_usage.route_id = transportation_routes.route_id GROUP BY route_name;
SELECT * FROM transportation_routes;
SELECT route_name, route_distance FROM transportation_routes WHERE route_type = 'bus';
SELECT route_id, route_name, route_distance FROM transportation_routes ORDER BY route_distance DESC;

SELECT route_name, stop_name, departure_time, arrival_time FROM transportation_routes JOIN transportation_schedules ON transportation_routes.route_id = transportation_schedules.route_id JOIN transportation_stops ON transportation_stops.stop_id = transportation_schedules.stop_id;

SELECT route_name, user_name, user_email FROM transportation_routes JOIN transportation_schedules ON transportation_routes.route_id = transportation_schedules.route_id JOIN transportation_users ON transportation_schedules.schedule_id = transportation_users.user_id;
SELECT * FROM transportation_routes WHERE route_type = 'bus';
SELECT route_name, route_distance FROM transportation_routes WHERE route_distance > 100 ORDER BY route_name ASC;
SELECT stop_name, stop_location FROM transportation_stops WHERE stop_type = 'train' ORDER BY stop_location DESC;
SELECT route_id, stop_id, departure_time, arrival_time FROM transportation_schedules WHERE schedule_id BETWEEN 100 AND 200 ORDER BY departure_time ASC;
SELECT user_name, user_email FROM transportation_users WHERE user_phone LIKE '%123%' ORDER BY user_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM users
SELECT * FROM routes ORDER BY distance_km DESC
SELECT user_id, city FROM users WHERE age > 30
SELECT average_duration_minutes, start_location, end_location FROM routes WHERE distance_km < 100
SELECT username, email FROM users ORDER BY username
SELECT * FROM transportation_usage WHERE user_id = 1
SELECT route_id, start_location, end_location FROM routes ORDER BY distance_km DESC
SELECT mode_name, carbon_emission_per_km FROM transport_modes WHERE carbon_emission_per_km > 0.1
SELECT * FROM users WHERE city = 'New York' AND age > 30
SELECT travel_date, mode_of_transport, distance_traveled FROM transportation_usage INNER JOIN transport_modes ON transportation_usage.mode_of_transport = transport_modes.type_of_transport
